title: Jar And Cover
dimensions: H x diam.: 33 x 11.8 cm (13 x 4 5/8 in.)
description: Slender urn-shaped body, cut with shallow diamond pattern all over, a row of thin fluting top edge, wider fluting at base; fluted stem on square basecut with star on bottom; tall bell-shaped cover cut with shallow diamonds and prismatic rings, faceted finial.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jar And Cover.
glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-94-a,b.
